TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IndentedTextWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

summary.span: 提供可根据 Tab 字符串标记缩进新行的文本编写器。

span.span: Provides a text writer that can indent new lines by a tab string token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过提供插入制表符字符串并跟踪当前缩进级别的方法来扩展 。 extends a by providing methods that insert a tab string and track the current indentation level. 用多个缩进级别设置格式的文本对于生成的代码非常有用，因此此类由 CodeDOM 代码生成器实现使用。Text formatted with multiple indentation levels is useful for generated code, so this class is used by CodeDOM code generator implementations. 选项卡字符串是每个缩进包含的字符串。The tab string is the string that each indentation consists of. 通常，选项卡字符串包含空白。Typically the tab string contains white space. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含应用于所有成员的类级别的链接要求和继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 当直接调用方或派生类不具有完全信任权限时，将引发 。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[继承要求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在不同的缩进级别写入文本。The following code example demonstrates using an to write text at different levels of indentation. [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 的缩进级别。The following code example demonstrates setting the indentation level of an . 缩进级别是要将每一行作为前缀的制表符的数目。The indentation level is the number of tab strings to prefix each line with. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在不使用制表符字符串缩进的情况下编写行。The following code example demonstrates writing a line without tab string indentations. [!code-cpp[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[IndentedTextWriterExample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/IndentedTextWriterExample/VB/form1.vb#6)]
